sentences.sContent: They talked her round to their position.
sentences.sCn: 他们说服她同意他们的看法。

sentences.sContent: He manoeuvred the enemy out of their position.
sentences.sCn: 他用计谋使敌人离开他们的阵地。

sentences.sContent: He would not knuckle down under their pressure.
sentences.sCn: 他不会在他们的压力下屈服的。

trans.tranOther: indicate that something belongs or relates to the group of people, animals, or things that you are talking about
